mapper.insert: insert into carousel_t (caro_num, pro_num, pro_name, caro_content, caro_up_folder, caro_img) values (null, #{pro_num}, #{pro_name}, #{caro_content}, #{caro_up_folder}, #{caro_img})
mapper.select: select count(*) from carousel_t where caro_num > 0
mapper.update: update carousel_t set pro_num = #{pro_num}, pro_name = #{pro_name}, caro_content = #{caro_content}, caro_up_folder = #{caro_up_folder}, caro_img = #{caro_img}, caro_up_date = now() where caro_num = #{caro_num}
